intro: Hedyotis corallicola, commonly known as the coral tree or coralroot, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pink and red. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Hedyotis corallicola is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
